node.title: After seven years, police hope for William Tyrrell breakthrough within two weeks
node.description: Police hope using  a "different type of search method" at "new locations" will help them find the body of William Tyrrell who went missing from the NSW Mid-North Coast more than seven years ago.
node.content:
["It's been more than seven years since William Tyrrell was last seen \u2014 now police hope a major development is as little as two weeks away.", "Yesterday, police announced hundreds of officers would be involved in a \"high intensity\" search at three locations which had never been scoured before around Kendall, on the NSW Mid-North Coast.", "The sites are near where three-year-old William \u2014\u00a0who disappeared on September 12, 2014 \u2014\u00a0was last seen.", "Detective Chief Superintendent Darren Bennett said the operation had been sparked by \"new evidence\" and would last between two and three weeks.", "\"We think this provides us with the best chance of finding him,\" he said.", "He conceded it was doubtful the boy was still alive.", "\"It's highly likely that if we found something it would be a body. We are looking for the remains of William Tyrrell, no doubt about that,\" he said.", "", "
Police said it was clearing land and using new search methods around Kendall, near where William disappeared in 2014.(ABC News: Luisa Rubbo)
", "William \u2014\u00a0dressed in a\u00a0Spider-Man outfit \u2014\u00a0vanished from his foster grandmother's house at Kendall seven years ago.", "William and his slightly older sister, who cannot be named for legal reasons, were playing \"tigers\" on the lawn before his foster grandmother went inside to make tea.", "When she\u00a0returned outside, William was gone.", "Hundreds of NSW Police and forensic vehicles were yesterday seen around the small coastal town, scouring wooded areas.", "When asked if officers had been chopping down trees, Detective Chief Superintendent Bennett said they were \u201cclearing ground\u201d in three specific areas.", "He said the operation was sparked by fresh evidence.", "", "
William Tyrrell vanished from his foster grandmother's frontyard in 2014.(AAP:NSW Police)
", "Despite extensive searches conducted and an inquest into William's disappearance, he said the operation was checking \"new locations\" and involved a \"different type of search method\".", "He said he was \"very hopeful that we can bring this matter to some sort of conclusion\".", "The findings from am 18-month\u00a0coronial inquest in William's disappearance which began in March 2019 was supposed to be handed down this year.", "Thousands of pieces of evidence and leads were considered and the inquest heard emotional testimonies from his family, including from his sister who vowed to become a police officer one day to find him.", "Deputy state coroner Harriet Grahame is expected\u00a0to deliver her findings early next year.", "Detective Chief Superintendent Bennett said: \"This activity is in response to evidence we have obtained in the course of the investigation, not speculative in any way.\u201d", "He said finding a body would be a development, but not the end of the police probe.", "\"I'm not anticipating a swift end of the investigation, by any means,\" he said.", "Police said\u00a0the $1 million reward leading to the capture of William's abductor was still available."]
